title: Sequence Jobs at a Workstation
description: A supervisor needs to manually sequence the jobs queued at a specific workstation for the day to minimize setup time.

tasks.description: List all work orders scheduled for the 'Painting' workstation for today.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a list of 5 jobs with different color requirements.

tasks.description: Analyze the setup time required for color changes between jobs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the optimal sequence to minimize color changes (e.g., light to dark colors).

tasks.description: Reorder the job sequence in the system and publish the new queue for the operator.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the job order in the MES queue.
